resources.string: You may search your library or graveyard for a shrine and put it onto the battlefield
At the beginning of your precombat main phase
Each opponent loses %1$d life and you gain %2$d life
At the beginning of your end step. Pay 1 for each
Destroy target creature with %d or less toughness
Go-Shintai of Ancient ways deals %d damage to target player or planeswalker
Honden of Infinite Rage deals %d damage to any target
Whenever an ability of a shrine (except Sanctum of All) triggers, that ability triggers an additional time
